name: EWorlds
summary:
Make your way through limitless adventures in this multiplayer 3D platform game!
eWorlds is a social experience where you can chat and meet your friends to live lots of adventures, interact with other players, compete, and solve mysteries together.

Discover an endless universe!
From mysterious caves to bubbling volcanos, each one full of amazing secrets, new environments, powerups, but also, dangerous enemies and cunning traps… beware!
